property.value: (Limit 1 per deck.) POWER: Stops a physical or energy attack. Stops all of your opponent's attacks this combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: Energy attack costing 2 stages. DAMAGE: 6 life cards. Damage from this attack cannot be prevented. If you deal critical damage with this attack, you may use 2 critical damage effects instead of 1. Raise your anger 1 level.

property.name: Text
property.value: (Heroes only.) POWER: Look at your opponent's hand and choose a card. Your opponent shuffles that card into his or her Life Deck.

property.value: (Limit 1 per deck. Banish after use.) Energy attack costing 2 stages. DAMAGE: 3 life cards. Search your Life Deck for a non-Dragon Ball card and place it into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: (You cannot win by MPPV if you use this card. Banish after use.) POWER: If the power level of your opponent's MP is higher than your MP's power level, raise your anger 6 levels.

property.name: Text

property.value: POWER: Draw 2 cards and then discard 2 cards from your hand unless you discard a Styled Drill from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: (If this card is discarded from your hand during combat, place it into play.) ENDURANCE 2. POWER: Choose an Ally, Drill, Setup or Dragon Ball in play and shuffle that card into its owner's Life Deck.

property.name: Text

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: (This card is considered Named.) Physical attack costing 1 stage. Lower a player's anger 1 level. If stopped, destroy the top 2 cards of your opponent's Life Deck. DAMAGE: AT +3 stages. HIT: This attack stays in play to be used a second time this combat. (Created by Josh Duquette, OP1 East Kai Champion)

property.name: Text
property.value: (As an action, you may banish this card from your hand to search your discard pile or Banised Zone for an Ally and play it.) POWER: Search your Life Deck or discard pile for an Ally and play it. Raise an Ally to its highest power Stage. You may use a critical damage effect. (Created by Matt Tambor, OP1 North Kai champion)

property.name: Text
property.value: (Limit 1 per deck.) INSTANT POWER: Use when you would lose by Survival Victory during combat. You cannot lose the game during this action. At the end of this action, shuffle the bottom 5 cards of your discard pile into your Life Deck. (Banish after use.) (Created by Tim Batow, OP1 Grand Kai Champion)

property.name: Text
property.value: POWER: Draw 2 cards. Discard a card from your hand. You may choose a Drill in your hand and place it into play. (Banish after use.) (Created by Cory Aguilard, OP1 South Kai Champion)

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: (This card is considered Named.) Energy attack costing 2 stages. You may raise your anger 1 level. If you have played another card with Sword in the title this turn, your opponent cannot modify or prevent damage from this attack and damage from this attack is banished. DAMAGE: 5 life cards. (Banish after use.) (Created by Oscar L., OP1 West Kai Champion)

property.name: Text
property.value: (Limit 1 per deck.) CONSTANT POWER: Whenever you perform an attack with Sword in the title your MP may pay 1 stage to make that attack deal +1 stage and +1 life card of damage. INSTANT POWER: EARTHLING: If you have 2 or less Traits, use after performing a successful Styled or Named attack that has Sword in the title. That attack stays in play to be used a second time this combat. (Created by Jordan Syverson, OP1 Supreme Kai Champion)

property.name: Type
property.value: Hero Ally

property.name: Text
property.value: (If your MP is Dende or Nail, you may use this Power regardless of your MP's power stage and once per combat when this Ally enters play, draw a card.) CONSTANT POWER: Your MP's PUR is +1. POWER: Rejuvenate 1. You cannot win by MPPV this turn. Once per game, if your MP has NAMEKIAN or EARTHLING, you may banish Guru - Great Elder to advance your MP 1 level. At the end of combat, lower your MP 1 level.

property.name: Text

property.name: Text
property.value: (Limit 2 per deck. Energy attack costing 2 stages. Lower a player's anger 2 levels. DAMAGE: 5 life cards. (Created by Kevin Dennis, OP2 North Kai Champion)

property.name: Type

property.name: Text
property.value: (If the highest power level on your MP's level 4 is 500,000 or less, you may banish this card from your hand as an action to search your discard pile for a card that can attach to your MP and place it into play attached.) Physical attack. Search your Life Deck for a Saiyan Ally and play it. DAMAGE: 3 stages. (Created by Trevor Cox, OP2 East Kai Champion.)

property.name: Text
property.value: (Heroes only. Limit 2 per deck.) INSTANT POWER: Use when entering combat. Search your discard pile for a card and place it into your hand. If you have more than 3 cards in your hand, place a card from your hand at the bottom of your Life Deck.
